contextId.information: These two extremes are given to emphasize the entire grape may not be eaten. AT: "from any part of a grape" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: from the seeds to their skins

contextId.information: These are all places in Sihon's kingdom. This means the Israelites destroyed Sihon's entire nation. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: Heshbon ... all the way to Dibon ... all the way to Nophah ... to Medeba
